New third-party insurance premium rates for Electric Vehicles are as follows: Category Vehicle Type Exisiting Rates (Rs) FY 2019-20 Proposed Rates (Rs) FY 2020-21 Private Cars Not Exceeding 30 kW 1,761 1,855 Exceeding 30 kW but not exceeding 65 kW 2,738 2,838 Exceeding  65 kW 6,707 6,707 Two Wheelers Not Exceeding 3 kW 410 430 Exceeding 3 kW but not exceeding 7 kW 639 654 Exceeding 7 kW but not exceeding 16 kW 1,014 1,106 Exceeding 16 kW 1,975 2,185 Content of this website is designed purely to raise EV  adoption awareness among automobile consumers.
